title: Tensei Shitara Kyuuketsuki-san Datta Ken - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Shounen   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Ability Steal   Alchemy   Beast Companions   Clever Protagonist   Cooking   Dungeons   Evolution   Firearms   Game Elements   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Humanoid Protagonist   Level System   Magic   Male Protagonist   R-15   Reincarnated as a Monster   Reincarnated in Another World   Skill Assimilation   Vampires   Weak to Strong
author: Red Post   赤ポスト
description:
I have reincarnated into a different world as a Vampire Egg.

Moreover, bishoujo? Nono, bishounen?

I suck the blood of monsters while growing up in the dungeon, steal their abilities and level up.

I gather【Titles】and evolve.

I encounter a hikikomori sage (former hero party member) and become the strongest.

Completing the monster picture book, creating weapons with alchemy and dungeon cooking.

Conquering the seven greatest dungeons while enjoying heartwarming dungeon life.>
